price: 13. Wuxuu u yeedhaa oo baryaa mid dhibtiisu uga dhowdahay dheeftiisa; Isagaa u xun wax laga dhigto sokeeye, una xun wax laga dhigto xigaalo iyo saaxiib.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقۡرَبُ مِن نَّفۡعِهِۦۚ لَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡعَشِيرُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
